T02TD1328E:283a-1: sa ma ho ma bi dhi n'a ma /
T02TD1328E:283a-3: ro bsreg pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba /
T02TD1328E:283a-4: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1328E:283a-5: rdo rje gur las gsungs pa ste //
T02TD1328E:283a-6: rdo rje dril bu lag tu sbyin //
T02TD1328E:283a-7: dbu rgyan mgo la bzhag nas su //
T02TD1328E:283a-8: rdo rje sdom pa sngon bya zhing //
T02TD1328E:283a-9: bum pa'i dbang ni bskur bar bya //
T02TD1328E:283a-10: mig sogs gti mug la sogs dang //
T02TD1328E:283a-11: rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum dgod //
T02TD1328E:283a-12: rdo rje thab khung sbyin pa yis //
T02TD1328E:283a-13: yang dag 'dus byas mnyam par brtsam //
T02TD1328E:283a-14: zhag bdun dag ni lon nas ni //
T02TD1328E:283a-15: rus pa'i tshogs ni nye bar bsdu //
T02TD1328E:283a-16: 'o ma dri zhim chus bkrus te //
T02TD1328E:283a-17: mchod rten dag ni rab tu bya //
T02TD1328E:283a-18: de la 'di'i don dang po khrus byas la /
T02TD1328E:283a-19: dbu rgyan dang gos la sogs pa byin te /
T02TD1328E:283a-20: ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor bris la /
T02TD1328E:283a-21: dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa la sogs pa bya ste /
T02TD1328E:283a-28: yi dam lha'i gzugs su bskyed la /
T02TD1328E:283a-29: ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa sngon du 'gro bas /
T02TD1328E:283a-30: mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas la /
T02TD1328E:283a-31: sngags kyi phreng ba mang po bzlas te /
T02TD1328E:283a-34: bdud rtsi myang ba byas nas sngags mang po bzlas la /
T02TD1328E:283a-35: ji lta ba bzhin gyi me thab tu me lha bskyed la /
T02TD1328E:283a-36: de'i snying gar rdo rje sems dpa'am /
T02TD1328E:283a-37: yi dam lha'i 'khor lo dang bcas pa la /
T02TD1328E:283b-0: ro'i ye shes sems dpa' @283b gshegs su gsol /
T02TD1328E:283b-1: de'i dam tshig sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo dang ro gcig tu lhag par mos la /
T02TD1328E:283b-2: yang dag par 'dus byas so zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1328E:283b-3: gal te de ltar ma byas na mchod rten gzhig pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1328E:283b-4: dam tshig dang ldan pa rnams kyis ro bsreg pa'i cho ga / rdo rje gur nas gsungs pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1328E:283b-6: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po slob dpon aa wa dh'u t'i pa dang /
T02TD1328E:283b-7: bod kyi lo ts'a ba dge slong ba ris bsgyur cing zhus pa'o //
T02TD1328E:283b-8: blo gros chen pos mdzad gsung /
T02TD1328E:283b-9: bdun tshigs ni zhag bdun bdun zhing khrus bya'o //
T02TD1328E:283b-10: slob mas slob dpon bsreg tu mi rung /
T02TD1328E:283b-11: gal te gzhan med na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsregs par bsam mo //
T02TD1328E:283b-12: rus pa la khrus byed na /
T02TD1328E:283b-13: rang nyid yi dam lhar bskyed la /
T02TD1328E:283b-14: rang gi snying ga nas 'od 'phros pas /
T02TD1328E:283b-15: ye shes pa bkug la rus pa la gzhug yang snying ga nas 'od zer gyis lha mo'i tshogs nam mkha' la bltas la /
T02TD1328E:283b-16: de rnams kyis bum pa bzung nas khrus byas par bsam mo //
T02TD1328E:283b-17: ji ltar bltams pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags dang bcas pa brjod cing khrus bya'o //
T02TD1328E:283b-18: dbang bskur nas ro khrus bya /
T02TD1328E:283b-19: lhar bskyid la ye shes pa gzhug / de la dbang bskur de dus rang gis tshig bshad brjod /
T02TD1328E:283b-20: de yang de'i slob ma snying nye bas bya'o //
T02TD1328E:283b-21: rus pa de bum chus zhag bdun la nyi ma re re la khrus 'khor gsum gsum du bdun phrag bdun du bya'o //
T02TD1328E:283b-22: yi ge brgya pa bzlas shing bya gsungs//
